summary: This release adds a new 'Native Dark Mode' beta feature. When trying it out, please disable the Dark mode extension/MHCT setting, as it may conflict with the new feature.

details.title: New Features
items: Legacy HUD and related features are no longer experimental, they've been moved to the main features list

details.title: Better Mice
items: Fixed mouse stat sorting not applying when on a Hunter's profile

details.title: Better Travel
items: Added a search feature to the travel window

details.title: Journal Changer
items: Added fallback to last chosen theme when traveling to a location without a theme available

details.title: Lucky Golden Shield Duration & Reminder
items: Updated timing to better sync with horn timer

details.title: Location Dashboard
items: Updated all Living Garden region information
Updated text seperators to be more consistent

details.title: Location HUDs
items: Minor style updates for various locations, like Living Garden Region and Moussu Picchu

details.title: Other
items: Added more checks and safeguards to prevent errors
Moved map height changes from 'Better Maps' to 'Taller Windows'
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
